name: 1 - Godot 4 (Beta 10) Pong Game
description:
Description

A very quick version of Pong built as part of my 50 weeks 50 games challenge. Starting off with Pong as my deadline approaches. 

This game was built with Godot 4 (Beta 10) source code available on my github page for anyone to look at and use for their own needs.
